text: E'ina hu'negu Ra Anumzana Mikozama Kegava Hu'nea Anumzamo'a amanage hie, Safezama huta vahe zamazampi asama tro'ma huntazageno krifufima namama azeriazama huno zamazeri'nea zana zamazampintira rutraga hutre'nugeno, namaramimo'za krifufinti aru kraruvazi'za hare'za frazankna hu'za kinafintira fru hu'za manigahaze.
